ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “All this trash.
Can't we do anything with it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:2}); // “All this belongs to the owner
of the Weapons Shop.
He keeps picking things up
and saving them here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // “Oh, you mean the owner who has
a tank in his shop.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:4}); // “But any way you look at it,
it's just trash…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “Is this pile of trash
getting bigger?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // “Yes, I think so.”{PAUSE}“A lot of things came falling down
when the Sector 7 pillar fell.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Right, right, you're right.
The owner of the Weapons Shop
scavenged all the stuff when it
came falling down.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // “Oh is that why?
He seems pretty suspicious
these days.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // “Oh, you mean he went out to
the Plate cross section next
to the Don's Mansion, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // “Oh, you know!
I wonder what he's doing?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // “Yeah!
It gives me the chills.”

dialogStrings:
“All this trash.
Can't we do anything with it?”

“All this belongs to the owner
of the Weapons Shop.
He keeps picking things up
and saving them here.”

“Oh, you mean the owner who has
a tank in his shop.”

“But any way you look at it,
it's just trash…”

“Is this pile of trash
getting bigger?”

“Yes, I think so.”{PAUSE}“A lot of things came falling down
when the Sector 7 pillar fell.”

“Right, right, you're right.
The owner of the Weapons Shop
scavenged all the stuff when it
came falling down.”

“Oh is that why?
He seems pretty suspicious
these days.”

“Oh, you mean he went out to
the Plate cross section next
to the Don's Mansion, right?”

“Oh, you know!
I wonder what he's doing?”
